## Macroscopic impact

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}
In general: 

- Intermittency
- Scalar Mixing
- Eddies
- Structure and energy Cascade
- Dissipation at small scales
- Chaotic, yet structured

In fire dynamics:

- Mixing for combustion
- Fire plume dynamics
- Enhance of heat and mass transfer
